mapper.insert: insert into trade (trade_from, trade_to,trade_amount,trade_state, trade_info) value( #{trade_from} ,#{trade_to}, #{amount} ,#{trade_state}, #{trade_info} )
mapper.select: select t.*, s.seed_point, date_format(t.trade_date,'%Y.%m.%d %T') as fmtdate from trade t join seed s on t.trade_to = s.seed_number where (t.trade_to = #{seed_number} ) order by t.trade_date desc
